content: उत्कंठा {@--1@} Anxiety, uneasiness (in general); य स्यत्यद्य शकुंतलेति हृदयं संस्पृष्टमुत्कंठया <ls>Ś. 4. 5</ls>; अवाप्त° <ls>Māl. 2. 12</ls> seized with fright, suddenly startled. {@--2@} Longing for a beloved person or thing; दृष्टिरधिकं सोत्कंठमुद्वीक्षते <ls>Amaru. 24.</ls> {@--3@} Regret, sorrow, missing anything or person; गाढोत्कंठा <ls>Māl. 1. 15</ls>; <ls>Me. 83.</ls>
